EmailTemplate.description: RMA response for Honeywell International SARL
EmailTemplate.name: RMA HIS
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Attached is the requested Return Material Authorization (RMA). Please download the Material Return Tag from our portal: https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/-/media/Files/Documents/Claims/Material%20Return%20Tag/tag_V4.pdf.
Please follow these steps to ensure prompt processing of your credit:
1. Include the RMA form and the completed Material Return tag with the returning product(s). 2. Return 8130 Tags and all quality control reports with the returned product(s). 3. Return all parts in original packaging. 4. Secure page 2 of the bar coded RMA form, outside the box, to ensure visibility. 5. Return the product(s) to the below address within 30 days.
Aero HIS Hemel Hempstead Honeywell International SARL Unit 2 Chevron, Eaton Rd. Hemel Hempstead, Hertfordshire HP2 7DR, United Kingdom.
Failure to follow the above steps may delay credit processing. Products received beyond 30 days and/or without RMA documentation will be returned at customerâ€™s expense.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
